verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> were clean <S%H8552><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> out of every tribe a man, <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And command <S%H6680><s%> ye them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H5375><s%> you hence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> out of the place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4673><s%> where the priests' <S%H3548><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> stood firm, <S%H3559><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and ye shall carry them over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you, and leave <S%H5117><s%> them in the lodging place, <S%H4411><s%> where <S%H834><s%> ye shall lodge <S%H3885><s%> this night. <S%H3915><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H413><s%> the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of every tribe a man: <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and take ye up <S%H7311><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> of you a <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> according unto the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you, that when <S%H3588><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean ye by these <S%H428><s%> stones? <S%H68><s%>

Then ye shall answer <S%H559><s%> them, That <S%H834><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> when it passed over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off: <S%H3772><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and took up <S%H5375><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and carried them over <S%H5674><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> the place where they lodged, <S%H4411><s%> and laid them down <S%H5117><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> where the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> stood: <S%H4673><s%> and they are <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> every thing <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1697><s%> was finished <S%H8552><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> hasted <S%H4116><s%> and passed over. <S%H5674><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> were clean <S%H8552><s%> passed over, <S%H5674><s%> that the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> passed over, <S%H5674><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them:

About forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> prepared <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto battle, <S%H4421><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

On that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they feared <S%H3372><s%> him, as <S%H834><s%> they feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that they come up <S%H5927><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Come ye up <S%H5927><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were come up <S%H5927><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the priests' <S%H3548><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> were lifted up <S%H5423><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the dry land, <S%H2724><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto their place, <S%H4725><s%> and flowed <S%H1980><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his banks, <S%H1415><s%> as <S%H8543><s%> they did before. <S%H8032><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> in the east <S%H4217><s%> border <S%H7097><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And those <S%H428><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they took <S%H3947><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> pitch <S%H6965><s%> in Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H834><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H853><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean these <S%H428><s%> stones? <S%H68><s%>

Then ye shall let <S%H853><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> know, <S%H3045><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> came over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on dry land. <S%H3004><s%>

For <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H853><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, until <S%H5704><s%> ye were passed over, <S%H5674><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he dried up <S%H3001><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> us, until <S%H5704><s%> we were gone over: <S%H5674><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> might know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is mighty: <S%H2389><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye might fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
